verses.roman:
śrī-rādhikāra ceṣṭā yena uddhava-darśane
ei-mata daśā prabhura haya rātri-dine

synonyms: śrī-rādhikāra—of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; ceṣṭā—the activities; yena—just like; uddhava-darśane—in seeing Uddhava at Vṛndāvana; ei-mata—in this way; daśā—the condition; prabhura—of the Lord; haya—is; rātri-dine—day and night.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's state of mind, day and night, was practically identical to Rādhārāṇī's state of mind when Uddhava came to Vṛndāvana to see the gopīs.
